alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 3:02AM EST until January 17 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...One half foot to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.6 to 7.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol MA County. In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along the most vulnerable shoreline locales in Newport, Portsmouth and Middletown. This includes flooding at parking lots near beaches in Newport, and a portion of Hazard Road. Minor coastal flooding also occurs on several streets in the Common Fence Point area. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
